Blog.post: FEr lat saturdays onwards,i haf been veri close frens wif valli !i dunnoe why sundenli lah ,i guezz tat we r gettin 2 undastan each other better.She haf started 2 share her probs n too i 2 shar ma probs wif her ! SHe is actualli veri undastandin n sumore veri pretty ! ALot of ma guy frens ask me 2 tok 2 her ! ALah i dun help ma them help hvalli more worthy !HOpefull we will stay like tis foreva !!!!!!

EVerybody juz hold on a second plz !! I haf beeN treAted like an moronic mutha fuckin bastard ever since i became little bit relaxed n calm !PPl treatin me like dogs or their slAves,kolin me wif farnie names,ppl tokin ma back in different language !!! SO juz a warning or PRecaution fer thoSE who tink i,m juz silent person now n those FUcked UP duDes who TReated me like assholes,U PPL R IN FER DEEPSHIT n i,m gonna make u ppl go THrouGh THe SaMe PaIn N SuFfEring U PPL haf put me THrouGh !!! AND ITS NO MORE SAKTHIBOI,SAKTHIVEL,SATHIBOI....... ITS ME THE SAME OLD THIBOI ! ALSO ITS NO MORE (om sakthi om sakthi) its gonna be 289 AGAIN WHIHC GONNA RULEZ AGAIN ! And 2 thE fUCker frm TAt STupid SKOol who HAf CAused ME 2 HAf a pROb,u r REalli gonna CRy out ur own BLooD... U will NOE wad I mean VER soon !!!!!!!!

go one classical dance performance @ sgh... NIce sial the skool ! go wif ma tamil clazz makkals V&V(valli&veeni).. both of them were realli veri prettey lookin oso ! the best part was tat i sent them 2 the bus-stop n then alighted the bus.. then wen i was in ma dad's car they kol me n sya tat they get down the best liao since got many cockroaches ! alah then ma dad gave them a lift lah ! i paiseh sial valli,veeni wif ma family in one car ! then ma fuckin sista gave tat veri patheic look wen valli was sittin veri close wif me n whisperin in ma ears ! !tats all ah !Om sakTHi om SakThi

Today morning go skool ! rain like fuck sial ,got wet ! then i n hafiz siao do different types of fuckin position backstage wif nishant n jotham oso ! then i,hafiz tried breakdance ! fer us was like we did weel but as fer SUmONE we KEnot do ah ! NVm lah its juz a opinion ! okok then go movie wif ma tamil clazz ,miss kalayani treat us (veri gd sia she)then follow priya rau,veeni,valli go lot 1 eat @ mCdonals... Funny sial they all laugh till my stomach pain,then went home liao,OM saKThi om SaKtHi.....

Surprislingly i passed ma common test !! NOt a gd grade ah but very gd improvement lah ! Even though stiIl Not happY wif THe MarKs i tink tis will a steepin stone fer me do well in future mathz tests ! Nth Much lah today,neva go wif ma darlin today onli see her in the morning,then saw her veri moody be4 D&t lesson !!!! NOt sure WAd HAben !!! okay tats all fer today ,om SAkthI Om SaKtHi

well today mornin ekenot walk sial so neva go skool !Neva inFOrm ma honEy lah.. shE WaiT verI LOnG SiaL!go polyclinic see doctor n got mc n no need 2 train fer 1 week lah !!!! fuck sial !!!! i miss ma trainings ! haiya never see ma honey fer one day liao ! miss her lah !!! wad 2 do ,hopin 2 see her tml ! aniwea brazil won man . damm gd man ! ma team ArgeNtinA vs BraZil in Final ! BraziL wIl lose n then LEts SEE wad tat TWo Short assholes haf SAy ABT it !!!!!!!!!

Today got training lah.... Fun ,interestin n kewl !!!!! i was told 2 train as a midfielder... i like it sial, i parnter ah zul n both of us play veri gd sial !!!then we had 3 vs two situational plays which me,ah zul,kannaN play ah... gd sial we all ! we keep possesion of the ball veri long against chingee n saNI... then two side i play as center midfield which i realli played veri well ah ,create two goals ... but the nicest thing was tat i n sani were realli playin hard n aggresively against each other.i enjoyed it but on the other hand i hurt ma knee.. NVm MInd ah ,play soccer tis wan all usual ..then wen doin the xcercises i heard ma darling callin ma name frm level 4 ! then heard her scream n shoutin, playin in level four... cum nhom lah after tat... MA knEE JUz HurTS WEn StrAightEn ma Left LEg...

She made her decision early than planned.. as i wanted she did not leave me ... tats wad i say true love neva dies ,kewl man! wen she told me her decision i was veri veri happy lah.my eyes like veri brighten,i was overjoyed.... but oso other hand se told tat she still haf crush on PEi WEi ... Nvm lah TAt wan NOt important but she oso told tat she wun concentrate much on the relationship i dun undastand tat wan sial.. i try ma best 2 be wif her lah tats i wish now.I loVE DAlIlAh alots n fer info she is mine again,i,m veri happy n determined 2 do anithing. and 2 the fuckin mAtz"kalau kau berani sini ar...kite satu sama satu gadoh.." Om SaKtHi Om SaKtHi!!!!!!!!!!

me go skool late as unusal.. Veri leh trainin yesterday tats wake up early ,alamak neva see my darlin the morning..then after skool LJS 2 eat lah...Saw alot of matz walkin in lot 1 haiya i tink nth beter 2 lah they all...luckily my darling came wif her fren 2 lot 1, they saw me n camen sit wif me lah..i was full of joy after seein her face man.she was like normal tokin crackin jokes n makin of the old aunties laughin..i smiled but tat did not make feel either.She kept askin whetther i,m alrite i culd not say "no" or ""yes" but i shook my head ! i tried ma best 2 tok but i culd not.i was not maself today.. i dunnoe why man !i kenot talk as normal my tone was veri soft...She oso ask me 2 tok !!! i guezz i was realli veri soft n quiet !!! haiya wad 2 do!tis is wad i say "FATE"... tis oso show tat i,m always not luckily .... but i,m tryin 2 live ma life as ken !!!! i will do ma beat in all !!!!!Om sakthi Ok Sakthi !!!!!!!!

its basically sumthing 2 do wif the hearts of two ppl n 100% sureli not the appearance or groomin !Love is all abt care,concern,affection fer each other! love onli cums but neva goes damm it ........... i understan wad love realli is now ! And i promise i will try ma best not 2 embarass love ! but its realli hurtin wen love is misused!!!!!!!love stories never have an ending.Love is a moment that lasts forever....Love isn't blind, it just only sees what matters.Love that is true, never grows old.

haiyoo seems tat i kenot do anithing in skool sial ! i kenot laugh properli i feel doomed ! but on the other my honey seems normal,smilin @ me ! oso her fren estee ask if it was true tat i break wif dalilah ! i said ya then my dalilah asked me y ma face like tat ?? she laughed ! then tat MArc told sumthing n i showed ma middle finger @ him ! he started quarellin wif me liao ! then i oso already veri veri heartbroken lost my paitence n i BO tat i frm ANG lah ! then after few more vulgarities i walked away ah ! actualli i wud ealli wanna apologise 2 marc since it was my fault fer tis prob! aniwea i haf started hafin tis feelin tat dalilah is veri happy n enjoyin after she broke wif me ! its juz a stupid tinnkin of ma brain .... aniwea my best frens of mine not razzaq or nishant its one guy who i treated like ma own bro backstabbed me oso ! so i tink there is one more thing whhich could juz be hurt me alot ! i wish tat negative thing does not occur becoz i realli wuld not be able 2 overcum tat !even the sharpest knife will hurt me alot but the decison may hurt ma feelings alot ! i wish ijuz wish oso pray hard lah ! Om SakThi Om SaKtHi...

today veri dull lah,as usual got tution @ 1pm ! study fer mathz common test tml ! then go shop eat mee sotong then had a can of green tea which my darling likes!cum back ard 3pm ... on ma way back saw a indian man's funeral ! the memories of ma bro's funeral flased thro mind ! haiya better dun tok abt tat !!! chat wif ma dalilah n trouble her 2 send the ma fav. song ! i veri bad loh, disturb her wen she doin physics .... oos juz hopin harder n prayin harder tat the break-up is juz temporary till wed ! haiyyo tis things juz worries wenever i do anithing. aniwea i guezz maybe tis the last few days in the werld!but oso maybe it may not be ma last day too... everything lies her decision loh....

today was my first day writin blog ah ! oso today i had veri sad day today! i went wif my new kewl buddy shah rizal my skool team goalie ah ! then my darling dalilah oso follow ask go orchard! we go walk n walk n play arcade ah then cum back home !be4 i went i had a can of heniekken ah ! i mabo little bit ah n as usuual i blabbered alot ah !then cum online ah .. dalilah chat wif me ah ! i today kenot tahna liao loh so tell her abt feelings ! we cat veri long ah(private)... we came 2 a agreement tat till wed we will be close frens! on Wed she will make her mind whether 2 continue or end our relationship ! i kenot sleep tonite wan ah sureli becoz i veri worried the bad things wuld haben ! i love dalilah alot man ! she was juz the onli happiness in ma life!There's no joy if she not ard ! i miss her wenever i dun see her ! well juz wish she will 2 me n sathi i still love u n i wanna carry on wif u !!!! i c=kenot wait 4 wed man !

i Wake n sms ma darling lah !then watch tv veri long oso got a call frm ma honey ,she said tat i misunerstood the sms !actualli it was damm true ah !i agree........ then wanted 2 say bye so came online but she not online n i saw her nick as tis "ma tears WERE TRUE BUT U CONSOLING WAS FAKE "I DUNNOE WAD DO LIAO !I GOIN 2 SENTOSA ALONE NOW MUST WAIT FER MA COUSIN TILL 12AM THERE..MAYBE I KEN SPEND MORE TIME REFLECTIN MA MISTAKES...BYE PPL

hahahahahahahaaha,ma clazz got consolation prize sial !its was a gd xperience fer ma memebers but juz tat we could take it as we realli put in so much hard werk! NVM lah @ least we get $50 ! then go home change go play badminton ! after tat all go wif dalilah n slack @ the block there ! we play badminton again and everything went smoothli!but after i read "pei Wei" msgs ! i realli lost ma kewln paitence sial ! dunnoe leh i veri fierce lah !neva tok 2 dalilah after tat juz walk n ignore her !she beg me like hell sial but i show attitude 2 her sial!ma eyes were ready 2 cry as i felt like being treated like an bastard ...nobody likes me ah !then we go sit tok tok ,,,,then I ACT ALOT N SO RUDELY TAT MA HONEY COULD NOT TAKE IT ANYMORE SIAL !SHE STARTED CRYIN LIKE HELL ! MA HEART STARTED 2 MELT N I BECAME VERI CONCERED n i tried consolin her ! after much persuadin she stopped ! she became like normal but onli tat her voice was like a little bit funny ! i made fun of tat n she started laughin happily again !i felt little bit better after tat but still angry wif maself!See lah i so bad tat make ma parents cry,sista cry,rivals cry and oso ma darling dalilah cry oso !i tiNK i KenOT be gd @ all sial ! i tink i must start spendin more time wif dalilah n make sure i am fergived by her !She sureli not happy inside the heart wan but since she love me so much n oso since she dun wanna hurt me she juz smilin outside!PLz GOd HelP Me KeEp DAlIlah happy n make sure luqmun fergives me fer the mistake i did 2 him !

haiya today i veri bad,i make nishant shirt kena paint like hell sial !make him angry like hell oso ah !its all ma fault !yah i agree !Now must concentrate on winnin the competetion okay !oso nowdays i actualli feel sad abt once ma best fren writin bad abt me in his blog !i dunnoe why he is doin tat bad i guezz he is realli not happy wif me !anyway i would juz like 2 haf him back as ma fren if he dun mind !we fought fer our steads ! in the end we got seprated man !plz be normal man !!!
